content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### Coal and Iron Ore Processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) with iron ore inserted
- Stone furnace (position x2) with iron ore inserted
- Stone furnace (position x1) with coal inserted
- Stone furnace (position x2) with coal inserted

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is available and not currently processing before attempting to insert items.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items only when the furnace has finished processing to avoid losing items.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move closer to the target entity before extracting items to ensure successful extraction.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Verify that the tile is clear before attempting to place an entity to avoid placement failures.
